title: Interpretation of dreams about hitting someone I know with a hand on his face, back and stomach

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of hitting someone I know with a hand on the face, back, and stomach. Many people encounter dreams that have many interpretations from well-known interpreters in the Arab world, and among these dreams is seeing someone being beaten in a dream, which made many people search for an interpretation of the dream of being beaten by a hand. Somebody. I know. The face, back, and abdomen are among the dreams that some people see and carry important connotations that may happen to people in daily life. Interpretation of a dream about hitting someone I know in the face. The dream of punching someone in the face is one of the dreams that many people see in a dream, as this dream was interpreted by many of the most famous interpreters. In the Arab world, the interpretation of a dream about punching someone I know from hand to hand is as follows: It indicates an exchange of love and care for the person attacked in the dream. It indicates that the person spends all his time and money serving people. Hitting the same person in the face shows remorse for making the decision. Slapping in the face shows remorse for rejecting the one who proposed marriage to her. A husband slapping a pregnant woman in the face is evidence that she will give birth to a girl. Slapping a divorced woman in the face is a sign that circumstances have changed for the better and that she will marry if she wants. A slap in the face of a married woman indicates a feeling of comfort and appreciation. And achieving goals in life. Interpretation of a dream about slapping someone I know with a hand on the back. Interpretations of dreams vary according to the person’s social status and the events in the dream. Slapping someone on the back in a dream is one of the dreams that bring many interpretations, and the interpretation of a dream about slapping someone I know on the back is as follows: An unknown person’s slap on the back is a sign of losing worry and sadness from life and getting rid of sorrows. Slapping a married woman on her back is evidence of the approaching pregnancy and the birth of a child. Mentioned soon. Whoever sees a man hitting him on the back is a sign of bad reputation among people. Seeing a familiar person patting a debtor is a sign of help in repaying debts. An indication of the arrival of good news in a person’s life and a change in circumstances for the better. Interpretation of a dream about punching someone I know with the hand In the stomach, hitting a famous person in a dream is one of the dreams that carry good indications of the possibility of it happening to a person in his time or in the near future, according to what commentators said. The interpretation of a dream about punching someone I know in the stomach with a hand is as follows: Dreaming about a growing stomach in a dream indicates abundant sustenance and money in a person’s life. Seeing someone punching an unmarried girl in the stomach is a sign that she will get married soon. Hitting a married woman in the stomach is a sign of a stable relationship with Her husband and success in taking care of the home and family. A pregnant woman’s position on her stomach indicates ease of pregnancy and discomfort during childbirth. A stranger hitting a pregnant woman’s stomach is a sign of money and livelihood in a woman’s life. A man’s dream of someone punching him in the stomach indicates harmonization of life and getting rid of worries and sorrows. Interpretation Dreams of someone I know slapping a single woman. Interpretations of dreams vary according to the person’s marital status and according to the events in the dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about Al-Barisi for a pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a bresee for a pregnant woman: The bresee is an animal from the reptile family, and it is called many different names, such as gecko, gecko, or plover, and it has many colors, as well as several types. Including fences and climbing walls, and the insect that the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, ordered us to kill. Because it differs from other insects in that it is extremely harmful, and it is said that it is characterized by satanic energies, it made fire cool and peaceful for our master Abraham, peace be upon him. Here is more information about the encyclopedia. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about Al-Barisi: The famous translator Ibn Sirin believes that seeing Al-Barisi in a dream is a sign of the work of Satan and the jinn, God forbid, because Al-Barisi is characterized by extraordinary speed and the ability to hide, and it also requires great effort. To be able to kill him, which is sometimes poisonous. It is possible that the Parisian or the leper in the dream is the devil incarnated in his image, because he performs satanic acts. On the authority of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, that he said: (When Abraham was thrown into the fire, there was no animal on earth that could extinguish the fire except its weight, because it was expelled...) “Ibn Sirin believes that seeing Al-Barisi in a dream may be a sign of immorality and immorality, or that the dreamer follows Immorality and immorality, and it may be a sign of those who fight Islam and conspire against Muslims. If you see Al-Baraishi escaping in a dream, this is an indication of the escape of the disobedient criminal, or perhaps the dreamer will escape and abstain from responsibilities. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in a dream, this is a sign of... This woman suffers from stress and anxiety and is very afraid of giving birth. Interpretation of a single woman’s dream: Seeing Al-Baraishi in one dream indicates that in reality there is a person who harasses and exposes her a lot, and she cannot get rid of this person and it could also be a sign that someone is planning against her. And he does it. Her magic, her plots, or he becomes jealous of her. If an unmarried woman sees Al-Barishi in a dream, this is evidence that this girl may be exposed to harm and evil by others, whether relatives or friends. But if she runs away in her dream, she should be careful before entering into any relationship. An upcoming emotional one, because she may fall in love with a hypocritical person. If she kills the Prissy in a dream, she will get rid of a lot of pain, damage, and injuries that almost befell her. Interpretation of a married woman’s dream: If she finds a married woman in a dream, this is a sign that she will be exposed to many Family problems, whether with her husband or with her family, and this may also be a sign of her lack of presence. Understanding between her and her husband or children. In the event that a married woman kills or beats leprosy patients, this is a sign that she has a strong personality capable of triumphing over problems and overcoming crises that stand in her way. Interpretation of a man’s dream: Seeing a man in a dream suggests that the dreamer is characterized by Lack of responsibility and morals, avoidance of obligations, cowardice, and lack of courage in confrontation. The dream of Al-Barisi may be evidence that Satan is whispering to the dreamer and showing evil.

title: Dream interpretation of seeing olives in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing olives in a dream by Ibn Sirin: It is considered seeing olives in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin, indicates that kindness and sustenance will enter the dreamer’s life. Buying olives from the dreamer also indicates a new job that he will get in his next life. Buying olives in general is one of the good visions that indicate the greatest Sustenance, goodness, and happiness in the dreamer’s life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing boiling oil in a dream. Seeing olives in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream of eating pickled green olives for a girl heralds goodness and the achievement of goals and aspirations. Seeing olives with another person in her dream is one of the visions that warn her of marriage to A good person to her. To see large numbers of olives in an unmarried woman’s dream means a lot of money that she will receive. The interpretation of a dream about picking green olives is a harbinger of the joy and happiness that the girl will have. Seeing an olive tree indicates her close marriage with a person with whom she will be happy In her next life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dream about pickles in a dream. Olives in a dream for a married woman. Seeing large quantities of olives in a woman’s dream means kindness and a lot of livelihood that she and her husband will receive. Picking black olives in a dream for a married woman portends to her a lot of money and quick profit in the future. Her next life. A gift of olives in a dream from her husband indicates nourishment with an imminent pregnancy, and the fetus will be male, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing olives in a dream for a pregnant woman: The dream of a pregnant woman washing olives is a sign that her troubles and exhaustion are over and she enjoys good health. Also, the olive tree in her dream appears The ease of giving birth to her fetus and its good health and well-being. Olives in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate nourishment for the male child, and God knows what is in the wombs. Eating olives in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a lot of wealth and money that she will obtain in her next life. Olives in her dream are generally good visions. Which foretells that she will gain goodness and comfort, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing a tree in detail in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about olives for a manEating green olives in a man’s dream indicates the arrival of goodness and livelihood, which he will soon acquire. Seeing olives in a dream for an unmarried young man indicates On his close marriage to a beautiful girl. And picking olives indicates collecting a lot of money, which is permissible for a man, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dream about obesity in a dream. Interpretation of olive branches in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an olive branch in a dream shows strong and good relationships and indicates the existence of a close family. And cohesive. Seeing a broken olive branch in a dream is one of the unwanted visions that indicates family problems or the death of someone close to you. An olive branch in a dream is a sign of strength and solidity and means that the dreamer will reap a lot of benefits in his next life. Interpretation of seeing olive seeds in Dream: Dreaming of eating olive seeds indicates poverty and lack of resourcefulness and indicates that you are not paying debts and have encountered a problem. To dream of collecting olive seeds in a

title: Interpretation of a dream about going for Umrah with your family

preview.html: And when one sees that he is performing Umrah rituals in his sleep, he may have more happiness and joy, especially in the case of accompanying family and relatives, as this means a lot of goodness in this world and the hereafter, and through that, opinions on the interpretation of this vision will be given, so stay with us. Interpretation of a dream about going for Umrah in a dream: When one sees in his dream that he is performing Umrah rituals with his family. This can be evidence that the person and his family have a good reputation. If one sees that he is performing Umrah in his dream with his family. This can be a sign of happiness and spending time The kindness that the dreamer feels with family members. When a person sees in a dream that he is performing Umrah with his family. This may be a sign of increasing blessings and that he is living a life free of trouble. When a person sees in his dream that he is going to perform Umrah with his family and friends. It could be This is beneficial for the existence of family cohesion, because it indicates the security, happiness, and stability that the family enjoys. When a person sees in a dream that he is performing Umrah with his family. This can be evidence that all crises and problems will end once and for all in their lives. If one sees that He performs Umrah in his dream with his family. This could mean the presence of love and interdependence that binds the members of this family in all matters. You may be interested: Interpretation of seeing Umrah or going to it in a dream in detail. Interpretation of the dream of going for Umrah with the family by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin indicates that if he sees in The dream is that he went to Umrah with all his family members. This may be good news about the wonderful diet that will come to them. It also indicates happiness in their hearts because of this diet that helps them live well in life. Ibn Sirin explains in his interpretations that if One saw performing Umrah in a dream. It is an indication of achieving happiness, increasing the fortuneteller’s nourishment, and enjoying a good life without problems. Ibn Sirin explains that if someone dreams that he will go with all family members to Umrah. This may be evidence that this family has a good reputation that makes it Distinct from others. He also indicates that it has roots that extend over a long period of time. Ibn Sirin confirms that if a person sees in a dream that he is going to perform Umrah with his family. The family feels a kind of fragmentation, this is evidence of reconciliation between them and the end of the quarrel once and for all. Interpretation of a dream about preparing for Umrah. If a person sees himself preparing for Umrah in his dream, this may be a sign of repentance and returning to God. When someone sees in his dream that he is preparing to perform Umrah. This can be evidence of good deeds. It also indicates his integrity in religion. And keeping him away from all the sins and bad deeds in his life. If a person sees in his dream that he is preparing for Umrah, this may be a sign that he will earn a lot of money soon. When a person sees in a dream that he is preparing to perform Umrah, he may think that he will return to God and repent for what he did. He did it by committing sins. It was also shown that he performed some acts of worship that erased the

title: Interpretation of a dream about my single sister’s engagement for married, divorced, and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of my unmarried sister for a married, divorced and pregnant woman, engagement is one of the most beautiful occasions that can be celebrated, and it is also necessary to know that there are many different occasions that need a place after the engagement, and the engagement period is one of the most beautiful periods that young men and women can go through, and engagement can be a dream, and a person's engagement can be like my sister's engagement, and here we can put my single sister's engagement. Interpretation of a dream about engagement for married, divorced and pregnant women. Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of my unmarried sister for married people Seeing a married sister engaged to her unmarried sister, in this dream there are many indications and signs, one of which is that God will answer this girl's prayer and give her what she wants to get soon and seeing a woman. Her unmarried sister that there is a young man proposing to her in a dream and proposing to her in a dream and she is looking for a casual job, this indicates that she has found a new job in which she can fulfill herself, and here we put another. Indications for use: The engagement of a girl in a dream to her married sister to her married sister indicates that she will meet the knight of her dreams whom she longs for very much and unite with him. This also means a prosperous future, in which there will be many projects and achievements that the girl who dreams of it will achieve, but when she sees that her little sister is engaged, this means that she will marry a person with an important and distinguished position in the country. About the engagement of a sister in a dream, this is good news for this lady that the problems will be solved and her worries and sorrows will be resolved. And when a woman dreams that she is going to her sister's engagement, this means stability in married life and that she lives happily with her husband. See also: Interpretation of dreams about attending the wedding of single, married and divorced women, Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in detail Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of my unmarried sister for pregnant women When her pregnant sister sees the engagement of her unmarried sister in her dream, this matter has many different meanings, and this dream has many connotations and many interpretations, and it is also necessary to know that the dream of the engagement of my unmarried sister to a pregnant woman carries it. Many meanings we put here: If a pregnant woman sees her unmarried sister's engagement while she is at the engagement party, this indicates that her husband will get a prestigious position that will change their lives and things will change for the better. Also, when a pregnant woman sees that her unmarried sister will be engaged to someone she knows, this means that she will have good luck and meet the boy of her dreams and marry him. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her sister is crying, this indicates good morals and that she has a good reputation and a high position among people. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the marriage of a relative of an unmarried woman, Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen in detail Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of my sister Divorced The divorced woman is the woman who did not agree with her husband, so she preferred divorce and staying away from her husband so that the problems between them would not escalate, and it is also necessary to know that there are many opportunities that can improve for her and that she lives, as she can marry and marry again

title: Seeing a well in a dream and the meanings of a dream about falling into a well

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a well in a dream through a website in dreams, and see the opinions of dream interpreters on the interpretation of a dream about a well in a dream, the interpretation of a dream about falling into a well and leaving, or a child falling into a well, and the interpretation of digging a well in a dream. Seeing a well in a dream The well is mentioned in the Holy Qur’an in Surah Yusuf, where God Almighty said: “And throw it without a ditch, and a car will take it.” But what is the interpretation of the well in a dream? We will learn this in the following lines. The interpretation of a dream about a water well in a dream can indicate distress that will be followed by goodness and relief from God Almighty, and this interpretation comes from the story of Joseph, peace be upon him. A well in a dream can indicate money, and it can be a sign of knowledge It has been said that it is a marriage, and in some visions it could be a sign of imprisonment. A well can indicate deception and cunning, and water in a well for a man shows a beautiful woman, and seeing it for a woman shows a man of good character. Perhaps a well in a dream represents the owner of the house, and water in the well represents Money and livelihood. Perhaps the well represents the wife, and the water from the well represents money, and it may also represent the fetus in her womb. See also: Interpretation of thirst in a dream Seeing clear water in a dream The well in a dream The interpretation of the well in a dream, if it is found in the workplace, may indicate that the work being done The fortune teller is surrounded by secrets. The interpretation of seeing a well in a dream inside the house is good and beneficial for the fortune teller, and the well in the house indicates the man of the house. Seeing a dead person digging a water well in a dream indicates his request or need for good deeds or supplication. Seeing him looking at the well indicates that The dreamer is thinking about a woman and wants to get married. Flooding a well in a dream for a woman is an indication of the birth of many children and the occupation of raising them. Interpretation of a dream about a dry well for a woman is a sign of menopause and for a man it means stopping work. Interpretation of dreams about falling into a wellFalling into a well in a dream, If the water in it is clean, it indicates that the dreamer is working for a good man from which he reaps as much as he needs. Interpretation of dreams about falling into a well and the water in it is murky, may indicate injustice or malice from an unjust person. Interpretation of a dream about someone falling into a well may indicate falling into Rank, death, and the end of glory and power. The interpretation of a dream about falling into a well and emerging from it indicates that the dreamer will be relieved of his worries and problems, and God knows best. As for sitting on a well in a dream, it indicates the fortuneteller’s treatment or association with a cunning man and it will not harm him. And whoever sits in the well with his feet dangling inside it The dream may indicate the loss of his money or half of his money through deception or deception. The interpretation of a dream about a dry well and falling into it is deception and betrayal by a close person or by friends. As for drowning in a well, it is treachery, but with greed, and whoever pushes a man into the well may conspire against him in exchange for his own interests. I read about this: Interpretation of a vision about washing hands. Interpretation of a dream about drowning in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a child falling into a well. Whoever dreams that he is pushing his son into the well, indicates that he will be forced to do what his son hates. Perhaps it indicates the father asking the son to do something that does not please him.

title: Interpretation of a dream about entering a lover’s house for a single woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about entering the lover's house for a single woman? Many scholars of interpretation believe that seeing entering the lover's house is for a single woman. It portends good and has no harm, but rather brings goodness and food to the dreamer. Also, many dream interpreters see this vision as a sign of happiness, joy, and marriage to the person the dreamer desires. But there is another point of view that conflicts with this interpretation. It is that this vision shows that the girl indicates the necessity of repentance and returning to God Almighty, because she has committed many sins. This dream may also indicate that this girl thinks a lot about the person she loves, and she is very willing to marry him and bring them together in a house, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. What if an unmarried girl dreams of entering her lover's house? This is a sign of her fear and extreme anxiety about the opportunity to communicate with someone, and evidence of her excessive thinking about him. The dream of entering the house of a former lover may indicate a single girl. However, she feels homesick and misses this lover and wants to return to him again, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of seeing the lover in a dream and their meaning is the interpretation of a dream about entering the lover's house for a single woman by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is entering her lover's house. This is a sign of goodness and abundance that she will soon obtain, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees herself entering her lover's house in a dream. This is a sign of a close marriage with the person she loves and desires for a long time, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. This dream also indicates that she will establish many good relationships in the future with her husband's family, and she will soon witness happy days, God willing. Ibn Sirin also sees that if an unmarried girl sees her lover in a dream. This indicates that she will marry a foreigner other than the one she loves and desires, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. What if a single girl sees that she is entering her ex-lover's house. This vision is not considered good because she will be exposed to many problems and conflicts that will affect her and her psyche. And if this girl thought a lot about this lover and saw this dream. This will be a sign that they may return to each other again and he will come to ask for her and ask her to marry him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about going to the house of the one she loves Seeing yourself going to the house of the one she loves in a dream can indicate many things, including That: It is evidence that he will receive happy news. Or evidence that she will be in a relationship with the man she saw in the dream. And if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she went to her ex-lover’s house. This is a sign that she feels sorry for her previous relationship with this man, because of the sadness she saw with him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my lover’s mother in our house for singles If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that her lover’s mother is in her house. This will be a sign of her comfort and security with this person she is associated with, and evidence that she will be in a good relationship with her lover’s mother, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees her lover’s mother in a dream and she smiles at her. This will be a sign of

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about cleaning a child from feces for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a child from feces for a married woman. Interpreters agreed that seeing a dream about cleaning a child from feces has many different meanings, some of which express good and others bad, and the vision depends on the gender and social status of the dreamer, so we will show you the most important interpretations. From this vision. Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a child from feces for a married woman. Commentators said that seeing a child’s chair for a married woman indicates that she will achieve her goals or start a new project for her and that a lot of money will come in the coming period. It also indicates the stability of her life and that she will live a life full of blessings, happiness and comfort. When a married woman dreams that she is cleaning a child’s chair, this means that a relative will invite her to a wedding and that she will enjoy this party. But if a married woman dreams that she is cleaning a child’s chair in a dream and in reality she gives birth to a daughter of marriageable age, this indicates that her daughter will get married. Soon. If a married woman sees that she is cleaning the feces of a male child in a dream, this means that she will receive a lot of money in the coming days and that she will obtain this money after a lot of hard work and diligence. Also, if a married woman sees in her dream that she is cleaning a child’s stool and it emits a foul odor, this means that the woman will face many troubles and problems in the coming period. Also, the interpretation of a dream about cleaning a child’s stool for a married woman indicates that she will overcome her worries and anxieties, face problems and overcome them. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is cleaning a child’s chair and her clothes are dirty, this is a sign that God will give her a lot of money. This vision also shows that this woman is making a lot of effort to please her husband and children. If a married woman sees in her dream the feces of a child and someone else By cleaning feces, this indicates that one of the relatives is trying to reconcile with her and her husband. title: Interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream by relatives and strangers according to social status

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream, where harassment is a hideous act in reality and frightening dreams in a dream. Interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees harassment is a sign of his bad behavior, taking away the rights of others, and usurping their money. Seeing a person whom someone is trying to harass indicates Until the visionary person will face major problems and crises in his life. Seeing a woman harassing another woman shows the dreamer’s machinations. Seeing a woman harassing someone she knows shows that she is deceiving him and making plans. Whoever sees that he is harassing a deceased person, indicates that he has wrongfully extracted his inheritance of money. Whoever sees That the dead person abuses him is a sign of the dead person’s need for charity and prayer. Interpretation of a dream about harassment from relatives. Interpretation of seeing harassment from relatives in a dream is a sign of many disputes and skirmishes between the family and relatives. A woman who sees a man from her relatives trying to harass her in a dream shows the limitation of her freedom. And having control over her. A man who sees a woman from his relatives harassing him in a dream indicates that she is conspiring against him. Anyone who sees an uncle trying to harass him in a dream indicates the dreamer’s need for love and affection. And whoever sees an uncle harassing him in a dream indicates his need for support. Seeing a woman’s brother-in-law She is distressed by a warning of the troubles that will befall her because of her husband’s brother. Seeing a girl being mistreated by her brother in a dream means that she will suffer from injustice from him and the severity of his cruelty towards her. As for a father’s dream of abusing his daughter in a dream, it shows his fear of her and his intense love for her. The girl who sees her father The dead person mistreating her in a dream is a message for her to pray from him and give him alms. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about dead people crying in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about being harassed by a stranger and running away from him. If a person sees in a dream that a stranger is harassing him, this indicates the presence of hypocritical and deceitful people around him. A woman’s dream of a strange man trying to harass her in a dream indicates that she is under psychological pressure that always puts her in a state of stress and tension. Seeing a stranger mistreating a stranger in a dream can indicate an intense fear of the future and the dreamer’s anxiety about something. A dream about a woman is... Being harassed by a strange man and resisting him is a sign that she is waking up to the machinations of those around her and knowing what they have in mind towards her. If a man sees in a dream that a strange man is harassing him, this indicates the extent of his suffering and fatigue in understanding his relationship with those around him. Interpretation of seeing harassment in a dream for a woman Married: Seeing a married woman being harassed by another woman indicates that there is a conspiracy against her by that woman. Seeing a married woman with a stranger who is harassing her indicates that there are many problems around her. If a harasser sees a stranger but runs away from him, this indicates that he Get rid of the worries and problems that he was going through. If a married woman sees one of her relatives mistreating her, this indicates that there are disagreements between her and her husband because of her relatives. If a married woman sees that her brother is mistreating her in a dream, this indicates the theft of her money and inheritance. Read also: Tf
